name: Rive
description:
Your kingdom is being procedurally destroyed by armies from the south. Being the sole survivor of the initial attack you are tasked by the horned god to carry the burden of the hungering axe. Can you master it's cursed and ever evolving power in order to save your people?

    This game is a work in progress, it was started as a project for the boss rush game jam (link bellow) and will be finished sometime later this year.

https://itch.io/jam/boss-rush-jam-2021
